name: Refrigerator Surge Protector, Malictele Single Outlet Voltage Protector Home Appliances 120V 10A Voltage Brownouts Plug Outlet for Fridge TV Air Conditioners Surge Protector -1 Pack
short_description: Surge Protector: When there are sudden voltage spikes or surges in the power system, voltage fluctuations, power outages and current flow caused by high/low voltage, a refrigerator surge protector prevents unstable voltage from damaging your home appliances

Delay Start Function: When the voltage fluctuates, the delay function is activated to protect the appliance until the voltage stabilises. The delay indicator lights up and the appliance waits for 3 minutes to ensure that the voltage stabilises before resuming power supply

Operating Principle: The Refrigerator Surge Protector provides a 3-minute delay after a power interruption, allowing voltage to stabilize and preventing spikes from damaging your appliances during recovery
LED Indicator: The surge protector is equipped with LEDs to show the voltage status (Normal, Delayed, Over-Voltage, Under-Voltage,) to help users quickly check whether the device is working properly

Applicable Devices: Surge Protector suitable for refrigerators, air conditioners, ice makers, washing machines, and TVs, this surge protector offers safe and comprehensive protection for all large household appliances

name: Two Electronic Voltage & Surge Protector Combo - Protect your Refrigerator and Washing Machine Against High and Low Voltage, Brownouts and Spikes
short_description: Contents:  One Refrigmatic surge protector for refrigerator, one Lavamatic surge protector for washing machine.

Best protection:  Professional surge protectors, specially designed to protect your refrigerator and your washing machine against high and low voltage, brownout, spike, instant surge, power failure, voltage fluctuation and load shedding.

Protect your home main appliances: Use Refrigmatic for domestic refrigerators up to 27 cu. ft., ice makers and air conditioners up to 5000BTU. Use Lavamatic for front and top load washing machines.  Ensuring that these are safe from power spikes. These brief but powerful spikes can cause irreparable damage to your home equipment.

Delay period and light indicators: The delay period indicator turns on when the SURGE PROTECTOR is first plugged to the power outlet or after a power outage. It takes 30 SECONDS delay time to allow stabilization of the system. PLEASE WAIT 3 MINUTES before you plug in your appliance the first time you use this unit. Light indicators for Normal, High, Low voltage and Time Delay

name: Hughes Autoformers HUGHES AUTO Autoformers PWD30-EPO-H Power Watchdog Smart Bluetooth Surge Protector Plus EPO with Auto Shutoff - 30 Amp Hardwire Version
short_description: Emergency Protection: Ensure the safety of your RV and RV appliances with auto power-off during extreme voltage fluctuations; avoid costly damage and prolong the life of your travel trailer accessories, enhancing peace of mind on every adventure.

Hardwired Installation: Easy to securely install anywhere in your RV and connect to your RV's electrical system, helping to avoid theft of the unit. Once installed, simply plug your RV into any camp power pole and you’ll automatically be protected.

Convenient Remote Monitoring: Optional RVWhisper add-on enables monitoring via Wi-Fi/cellular, keeping you informed of your camper essentials with voltage meter data anytime, anywhere-perfect for the modern camper must haves in RV accessories.
Enhanced Safety Alerts: Stay ahead of electrical issues by receiving timely wireless fault alerts, ensuring your camper is always protected from unexpected power anomalies.

Economical & Eco-Friendly: Cut costs and reduce waste with the innovative replaceable surge module, ensuring longevity and sustainability in your RV setup; maximize the life of your essential RV camping accessories without frequent replacements.
product_description: The Power Watchdog 30 Amp Smart RV Hardwired Surge Protector with Emergency Power Off (EPO) is an essential tool for every RV enthusiast, offering robust protection and smart features to preserve your electrical systems. This high-quality RV surge protector provides 3000 Joules of defense against power spikes, while its emergency power-off functionality smartly shuts down electricity for added safety when voltage that is too high or low is detected. With an ingenious capability to restore power once stable conditions return, this surge protector ensures your camper's sensitive electronics are always safeguarded. Elevate your RV accessories collection with a surge protector that not only protects but also monitors. Featuring real-time monitoring through a free Bluetooth app, users gain incredible insights into voltage, amperage, and wattage levels. The quick 4-second power-on analysis prepares your camper setup faster, while built-in LED diagnostics and wireless alerts keep you informed of any hazardous conditions. Ideal for those who prioritize RV safety, RV essentials and camping reliability, its customizable alert thresholds give users unprecedented control over their electrical environment. Built for the rigors of outdoor use, this surge protector is compatible with dogbone adapters, making it adaptable to various campsite setups. As part of your trusted travel trailer accessories, this device comes with a Limited Lifetime Warranty, demonstrating the manufacturer's confidence in its functionality and reliability. Protect your RV and enjoy peace of mind on any adventure with this comprehensive surge protection and monitoring solution.
